mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dj_house_surplus_ware_house_item where 1=1
and surplus_ware_house_id = #{surplusWareHouseId}
ORDER BY create_date desc

SELECT whi.id, whi.surplus_ware_house_id as surplusWareHouseId, whi.product_id as productId, whi.product_count as productCount, whi.product_name as productName, wh.address as address FROM dj_house_surplus_ware_house_item as whi left JOIN dj_house_surplus_ware_house as wh on (wh.id = whi.surplus_ware_house_id ) WHERE 1=1
and address LIKE CONCAT('%',#{address},'%')
and product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{productName},'%')
GROUP BY whi.product_id ORDER BY wh.type and whi.create_date desc
